originalText.text: Nicola is kind, friendly, patient and very helpful. She explains lessons clearly and will review often. Her flexible schedule is great. Nicola also delivers excellent feedback and encouragement and really works with students to accommodate their musical tastes. Learning with Nicola is a pleasure I look forward to all week.

text.text: Nicola is kind, friendly, patient and very helpful. She explains lessons clearly and will review often. Her flexible schedule is great. Nicola also delivers excellent feedback and encouragement and really works with students to accommodate their musical tastes. Learning with Nicola is a pleasure I look forward to all week.

originalText.text: My daughters have been taking lessons with Nicola since the beginning of September. Both have learned so much in only a few weeks and enjoy the weekly class. Nicola is fun, encouraging, energetic and kind. I’m so glad we found Nicola and wholeheartedly recommend her if you are looking for a guitar or voice teacher.

text.text: My daughters have been taking lessons with Nicola since the beginning of September. Both have learned so much in only a few weeks and enjoy the weekly class. Nicola is fun, encouraging, energetic and kind. I’m so glad we found Nicola and wholeheartedly recommend her if you are looking for a guitar or voice teacher.

originalText.text: Nicola is a highly talented, versatile music teacher who’s been giving my teen guitar lessons for a few months - and we plan to continue! Nicola helps students tap into their unique creative style while they improve their technique, with an energetic, warm, and encouraging approach. As for coordinating lesson times or other questions, she is flexible and professional, very easy to reach and agreeable. Would 100% recommend!

Nicola helps students tap into their unique creative style while they improve their technique, with an energetic, warm, and encouraging approach. As for coordinating lesson times or other questions, she is flexible and professional, very easy to reach and agreeable. Would 100% recommend!

originalText.text: Nicola has been teaching guitar to my daughter for about a year. She is a wonderful instructor, very friendly, and easy to communication with. My daughter has learned a lot and her interest in playing guitar continues to grow. I highly recommend Nicola as a guitar teacher.

text.text: Nicola has been teaching guitar to my daughter for about a year. She is a wonderful instructor, very friendly, and easy to communication with. My daughter has learned a lot and her interest in playing guitar continues to grow. I highly recommend Nicola as a guitar teacher.

originalText.text: My daughter has taken guitar lessons with Nicola for several years.   She says, "I enjoy having guitar lessons with Nicola!  She is very nice and funny.  If you take guitar lessons with her, she can teach you so many different things, such as songs, chords, arpeggios, baselines, and so much more.  Nicola has helped me improve so much!  I definitely recommend her!"
